pages.title: Manamananama
pages.text: Using the $(item)Cauldron$() is fairly simple, even for a novice. Fill it with a liquid, then add a reagent to transform either the liquid, the reagent, or both. For now, we simply require $(item)Liquid Mana$() - a coalescence of magicks. There should be enough residual magic in those $(item)Infused Pasture Seeds$() to transmute simple $(item)Water$() into it for now.
